post_title: FS: Magie Error PSA 1 New to the Hobby
post_content:
For Sale Magie Error PSA 1: $16,000

This is a new to the hobby example that I purchased last year from a gentleman who had it passed down to him from his grandfather. 
The paper loss on the back is likely due to it being mounted in an album at one time along with other tobacco cards.

Free shipping through USPS registered mail.
Prefer Pay Pal FF as payment method or add 3% for PP GS.

Thanks for looking.
